effect_entries.effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Double-Edge)

flavor_text_entries.text:
技を　使った　ポケモンに　よって
技の　タイプが　変わる。

A unique attack that varies in type
depending on the Pokémon using it.

Mossa singolare che cambia tipo a seconda
del Pokémon che la usa.

Un ataque de gran potencia que resulta más
fuerte cuanto más le guste el Entrenador al
Pokémon que lo usa.

Der Typ dieser Attacke hängt vom jeweiligen
Pokémon ab, das sie einsetzt.

Attaque dont le type dépend du Pokémon
qui l’utilise.

기술을 쓴 포켓몬에 따라
기술의 타입이 달라진다.

わざを　つかった　ポケモンに　よって
わざの　タイプが　かわる。

A unique attack that varies in type and
intensity depending on the Pokémon
using it.

A unique attack that varies in type and
intensity depending on the Pokémon
using it.

La puissance et le type de la
capacité dépendent de l’aptitude
cachée du lanceur.

A variable move that changes type
and power depending on the hidden
ability of the Pokémon using it.

A variable move that changes type
and power depending on the hidden
ability of the Pokémon using it.

A variable move that changes type
and power depending on the hidden
ability of the Pokémon using it.

An attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the user.

The attack power
varies among
different POKéMON.
